components.name: GqJNNZ
components.content:
We need to ask some questions to check you can apply for this funding.

We'll ask about:

  • whether you agree to undertake a Green Belt review to accommodate an increase in your local housing need as a result of our NPPF (National Planning Policy Framework) changes
  • whether you agree to collaborate with MHCLG over monitoring and evaluation requirements
  • whether your Section 151 officer, or deputy Section 151 officer, is aware of this submission

pages.title: Will you be required to undertake a Green Belt review to accommodate an increase in your local housing need as a result of our NPPF (National Planning Policy Framework) changes?

components.name: oAnaAw
components.content:
You’re not eligible to apply for funding because:

  • you did not agree to collaborate with MHCLG over monitoring and evaluation requirements

If you need help, email the grant team at (email)
